name: NTP Configuration
description: This application steps you through a guide that generates a script for setting up NTP (Network Time Protocol) clients and servers.

title: iSCSI Helper
description: The iSCSI helper tool simplifies configuring an iSCSI target (server) or initiator (client). It handles the different configurations required for RHEL 5.4 and later versions.

title: Ceph Placement Groups (PGs) per Pool Calculator
description: The Ceph PGs (Placement Groups) per Pool Calculator application helps you: 1. Calculate suggested PG Count per pool and total PG Count in Ceph. 2. Generate commands that create pools.

title: Product Life Cycle Checker
description: Query the life cycle of Red Hat products, and better plan your deployment or maintenance.

title: VENOM: QEMU Vulnerability Detector
description: Script to detect vulnerability to VENOM

title: JBoss Data Virtualization Sizing Architecture Tool
description: Plan Your JBoss Data Virtualization Deployment

title: Linter for Dockerfile
description: Check your dockerfile compliance with best practices using this online tool.

title: JMX/RMI Remote Code Execution Detector
description: CVE-2014-3518 JMX/RMI Remote Code Execution Detector

title: Samba BADLOCK Checker
description: This script helps you confirm whether your system is susceptible to the Samba BADLOCK vulnerability.

title: Yum Repository Configuration Helper
description: Set up a Yum repository to be used by the local machine or remote ones.

title: SSLv3 (POODLE) Detector
description: The SSLv3 Detector allows customers to scan vulnerable systems for CVE-2014-3566 (POODLE).

title: Red Hat Memory Analyzer
description: Red Hat Memory Analyzer visualizes memory usage on your system based on information captured by the SAR utility.

title: Kickstart Generator
description: Create optimal Kickstart configurations for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5, 6, or 7 that are tailored to meet specific deployment goals.

title: DROWN (CVE-2016-0800): TLS SSLv2 Cross-protocol Attack Vulnerability Detector
description: This script helps you confirm whether your system is susceptible to DROWN.

title: IAVM Mapper
description: Look at the IAVM reports that are related to Red Hat products.

title: DNS Helper
description: The DNS Helper tool provides assistance with configuring different types of DNS servers. The tool works by collecting specifications regarding the RHEL version and DNS server product, then generates a bash script to automatically create and configure the server.

title: Red Hat Security Data API
description: This tool will allow customers to programmatically query an API for data that was previously exposed only through files on our Security Data page.

title: TLS 1.2 Renegotiation Test
description: Determines whether a host is TLS version intolerant.

title: OpenSSL CCS Injection Detector
description: Detect whether a given host has been patched against the OpenSSL CCS Injection vulnerability (CVE-2014-0224)

title: Load Balancer Configuration Tool
description: Plug in information about your Apache and JBoss configuration and get sane baseline configuration files.

title: Red Hat I/O Usage Visualizer
description: Red Hat I/O Usage Visualizer displays a visualization of the I/O device usage statistics captured by the sar utility.

title: RHV Manager History Database Size Calculator
description: The History Database Size Calculator estimates the minimum and maximum size needed for your RHV database history records.

title: Samba Configuration Helper
description: Build a basic Samba v4.x configuration to share files and printers.

title: Log Reaper
description: Log Reaper provides analysis of common RHEL and Middleware logs with an emphasis on break/fix.

title: VNC Configurator
description: Install and configure VNC server on your Red Hat Enterprise Linux

title: Network Bonding Helper
description: Configure two or more network interfaces to act as one "bonded" interface, simultaneously increasing the bandwidth and providing redundancy.

title: GIT - Integer Truncation And Overflow Vulnerability (CVE-2016-2324)
description: This script helps you confirm whether your system is susceptible to the git integer truncation and overflow vulnerability.

title: Multipath Helper
description: Create optimal multipath configurations for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5, 6, or 7 that are tailored to meet specific deployment goals.

title: Red Hat Mobile Application Platform 4.x sizing tool
description: This application helps plan your deployment of Red Hat Mobile Application Platform.

title: File System Layout Calculator
description: Generate a command to create a file system on given RAID storage.

title: SCSI Decoder
description: Discover and decode SCSI errors from your log files.

title: ImageMagick Filtering Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability was found in Imagemagick where insufficient filtering for files passed to a delegate's command allows remote code execution during the conversion of several file formats.

title: JVM Options Configuration Tool
description: Optimize your JVM tuning based on your workload and environment.

title: Multipath Configuration Visualizer
description: Multipath Configuration Visualizer extracts and visualizes multipath configuration from a sosreport.

title: GHOST (CVE-2015-0235) - gethostby Detector
description: This script helps you confirm whether your system is susceptible to GHOST.

title: AD Integration Helper (Samba FS - winbind)
description: This tool helps you connect a Red Hat Enterprise Linux system to an Active Directory server by generating Samba Winbind configuration. Basic information of Active Directory server is needed and a script will be generated. The script will config Samba, NSS and PAM for you.

title: Bridge Configuration
description: Configure a bridged network interface

title: Kdump Helper
description: Configure Kdump to dump vmcores

title: LVM RAID Calculator
description: Create LVM volumes on RAID.

title: RHEL Tuner for Oracle
description: This app generates a script that sets the tuning parameter in the operating system, which improves Oracleâ€™s performance.

title: Red Hat Virtualization Agent (virt-who) Configuration Helper
description: virt-who is required when working with any hypervisor if your subscription  includes the words "Virtual Datacenters", "4 Guests", or "Unlimited Guests". This app helps users configure virt-who. When started, the app requests information about your virt-who usage and generates a configuration file based on he answers. It also provides instructions for updating your virt-who configuration.

title: Red Hat Product Certificates
description: The Red Hat Product Certificates application helps you retrieve and install product certificate files.

title: Leap Second Issue Detector
description: Leap Second Issue Detector. The next leap second will occur on 2016 December 31, 23h 59m 60s UTC.

title: Registration Assistant
description: A simple guide to registering Red Hat Enterprise Linux systems.

title: Samba Vulnerability (CVE-2015-0240) Detector
description: This script helps you confirm whether your system is susceptible to CVE-2015-0240.

title: Kernel Oops Analyzer
description: Diagnose kernel crash issue.

title: Red Hat Code Browser
description: Browse Red Hat product source code, including ChangeLogs, RPM spec files, and individual patches.

title: Shellshock - Bash Vulnerability Detector
description: This application helps you test whether your system is vulnerable to Bash code injection.

title: JVMPeg
description: This tool will help you analyze JVM threads that are pegging the CPU above a specified threshold

title: RHEL Backup and Restore Assistant
description: This application introduces the most frequently-used backup/restore tools provided in Red Hat Enterprise Linux and helps you understand the common usage of each backup/restore tool by examples and how to choose an appropriate tool for a specific scenario.

title: Storage / LVM configuration viewer
description: The Storage/LVM Configuration Viewer analyzes the files included in a sosreport and creates a diagram to visualize the storage/LVM configuration.

title: Red Hat Network (RHN) System List Exporter
description: This app can retrieve information about systems that are still registered to Red Hat Network Classic (RHN).

title: Heartbleed Detector
description: Detect whether a given host is susceptible to CVE-2014-0160 -heartbleed-

title: NFS Helper
description: Generate a configuration script for a new NFS server or client.

title: Embedded Vulnerability Detector
description: Scan your Java application for dependencies on JARs with known security vulnerabilities.

title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux Upgrade Helper
description: Upgrade Red Hat Enterprise Linux from version 6.5/6.6/6.7/6.8/6.9/6.10 to the latest version of Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.

title: Red Hat Virtualization Upgrade Helper
description: Upgrade Red Hat Virtualization to a later version.

title: Rescue Mode Assistant
description: Rescue Mode Assistant helps customers to reset root password, generate sosreport, perform a filesystem check(fsck), reinstall GRUB, rebuild the Initial Ramdisk Image and reduce the size of the root file system in/through the rescue mode of Red Hat Enterprise Linux.

title: Winbind Mapper
description: Build an optimized Samba Winbind configuration to integrate with Active Directory servers

title: Packet capture syntax generator
description: The Packet capture syntax generator application will generate a tcpdump command to capture network packets.

title: Garbage Collection Analysis
description: Visualize and analyze Java Virtual Machine garbage collection logs.

title: Spectre And Meltdown Detector
description: Detect Spectre and Meltdown in Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5 or later

title: Red Hat Virtualization Upgrade Helper
description: Upgrade Red Hat Virtualization to a later version.

title: Red Hat Satellite Upgrade Helper
description: This app is designed to help you upgrade your Red Hat Satellite 6 to a newer version.

title: Network Teaming Helper
description: This app is designed to help you configure network teaming. The app will generate a script for you to configure network teaming based on the information you provided.
